CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Crimson Clash relative to Silverleaf Open?
SRP.A: Crimson Clash is {above} Silverleaf Open in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Silverleaf Open relative to Nova Games?
SRP.A: Silverleaf Open is {above} Nova Games in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Nova Games relative to Crimson Clash?
SRP.A: Nova Games is {below} Crimson Clash in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total stadium attendance?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Nova Games}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total stadium attendance?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Crimson Clash}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Starfall Championship's minimum Stadium Attendance in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Starfall Championship's minimum Stadium Attendance is in {2003}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Nova Games's maximum Stadium Attendance in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Nova Games's maximum Stadium Attendance is in {2009}.

NC.Q: Was the total Stadium Attendance in 1992 higher or lower than in 1997?
NC.A: The total stadium attendance in 1992 was {higher} than in 1997.

NC.Q: Was the total Stadium Attendance in 1989 higher or lower than in 1990?
NC.A: The total stadium attendance in 1989 was {higher} than in 1990.

NC.Q: Between 1988 and 1996, did the total Stadium Attendance experience a larger or smaller change than between 1998 and 2003?
NC.A: The change in total stadium attendance between 1988 and 1996 was {larger} than between 1998 and 2003.

NC.Q: Was the total Stadium Attendance in 2001 higher or lower than in 2009?
NC.A: The total stadium attendance in 2001 was {lower} than in 2009.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Nova Games} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Silverleaf Open and Crimson Clash first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Silverleaf Open and Crimson Clash first exchanged leading positions in {1989}.
